sentences.en: English is no Esperanto, but as world languages go, it is considerably user-friendly.

sentences.en: Esperanto was born in Eastern Europe.
Esperanto was invented as an auxiliary language.

sentences.en: He teaches Esperanto at that university.

sentences.en: It is, however, in China that Esperanto has had its greatest impact.

sentences.en: Mi opiniis gxoje, ke en Esperanto tio eblas!
sentences.cn: 我的梦想是能够阅读用外文创作的侦探小说.

sentences.en: Whatever popularity Esperanto has enjoyed is now on the wane.
sentences.cn: 即使世界语过去受到欢迎,现在也已经衰退了.

sentences.en: Why don't you learn Esperanto when you have such a good teacher at your side?
